items.sentence: If the baby hadn't started crying, the soldiers wouldn't have noticed us.
If you're that tired, you'd better not drive. You can sleep here tonight.
I realized that I had grown up when I started heeding my parents' advice.
Tom and Mary both played in the same orchestra, but not at the same time.
He is proud of the fact that he has never consulted a doctor in his life.
Hearing about people kidnapping little children just makes my blood boil.
Try the store across the street. They might have what you're looking for.
I'll be here today until 2:30, but tomorrow I'll only be here until noon.
There are a lot of stories flying around about why Mary left her husband.
We know that we need to buy more of these. The only question is how many.
Tom told me that he used to play the clarinet when he was in high school.
Tom was in a hurry to catch the bus, so he didn't stop to talk with Mary.
Tom didn't find out that he'd been adopted until he was thirty years old.
My parents don't like my boyfriend because he dropped out of high school.
I was surprised because my husband actually ate some of our wedding cake.
The driver stopped and opened the door, but nobody got on or off the bus.
All of the passengers managed to escape before the bus burst into flames.
You promised me that you wouldn't spend any more money on computer games.
Nobody knows how or why, but aliens abduct hundreds of people every year.
We searched the entire shop for Tom, and found him in the toy department.
